Description: Limestone ancestor bust with finely modelled head, on which are remains of red paint. The face is surrounded by the lappets of a long wig. Lower part of the figure is smooth and undecorated, finished off flat at the base.
Curator's comments: Published: J. L. Keith, Anthropoid Busts of Deir el Medineh and Other Sites and Collections (DIFAO 49, 2011), p. 336
Exhibition history: 2018-2019 12 Oct-13 March, Leiden, Rijksmuseum van Oudheden, The gods of Egypt
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Dr Carl Nicholas Reeves
